name: DOOM: Rip and Tear
description:
DOOM: Rip and Tear is a free expansion pack for Doom (1993), made up of 3 new levels. It offers a more direct experience centered on action, movement and secret hunting. As the legendary Doomguy,  your goal is to kill every demon in your way before defeating the Mastermind behind a demonic invasion on Mars.

Doom belongs to id Software. I do not own the rights to this game. Music by Mick Gordon. I do not own the music included in the game.
